job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Data Scientist- St. Louis</strong></p><p>no C2C, must be our W2.</p><p>Will consider qualified OPT if valid through August, 2022</p><p><strong>You will:</strong></p><p>Implement and design prototypes for data wrangling, preprocessing, postprocessing and visualization mechanisms, and</p><p>Design predictive/machine learning/AI type analytical models.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Description:</strong></p><p>• Collaborate with data scientists/engineers/stewards on data extraction and data cleaning.</p><p>• Design, implement and optimize statistical and machine learning models based on structured and unstructured data.</p><p>• Work closely with the software engineering team in the delivery of the developed models.</p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><p>• PhD in Mathematics, Economics, Operations Research or a related field with statistics courses/publications/proven expertise or...</p><p>• Master's&nbsp;degree plus 2 years of industry experience outside of academia</p><p>• Proficient in machine learning algorithms and&nbsp;concepts;</p><p>• Ability to work in a highly interactive, team-oriented environment. Comfort in communicating technical content in an&nbsp;easy to understand&nbsp;way</p><p>• Proficiency of at least one of Python or R is a must-have and working knowledge of the other</p><p>• Working knowledge of programming languages such as SQL, Java,&nbsp;Javascript, and&nbsp;Anylogic&nbsp;simulation software is a plus.</p><p>• Experience with optimization models and commercial solvers is a plus.</p>
